title: 820-01700 - No Wifi
message:
Have a liquid damaged 820-01700

No wifi hardware detected within OS, liquid damage around U3730.

Are there some base requirements for the Wifi to be detected, nothing looked like it had gone.

Thanks!

title: 820-01700 - No Wifi
message:
That was the extent of the liquid on the board.

[ATTACH type="full"]60591[/ATTACH]

title: 820-01700 - No Wifi
message: Replacing the corroded/damaged looking components is first step, then check if you have wifi again

title: 820-01700 - No Wifi
message:
Clean the affected area and rebuild all traces, if needed.
Also replace components.

title: 820-01700 - No Wifi
message: I have replaced all the components to the bottom and right of the Wifi chip, traces are all fine. Still nothing unfortunately.

title: 820-01700 - No Wifi
message: WiFi chip may be damaged because of leakage from power rails to data lines; caused by liquid spill.
